column1: Little Goat Diner////The food was well prepared and truly enjoyed by everyone.  Loved the Fat Elvis Waffles - great change from the norm.  Hash browns
column3: and Chocolate Chip pancakes were shared and ravished by all.  Highly recommend the Little Goat Coffee.  Our server
column6: making good suggestions and very helpful to our (and the kids) needs.  The other staff worked well in concert.
